pullRequest.body:
- reformulate `boundedContinuousFunction_dense` using `Dense`
- restore the old version as `boundedContinuousFunction_topologicalClosure`

---

```suggestion
    Dense (boundedContinuousFunction E p μ : Set (Lp E p μ)) := by
  intro f  
  refine (mem_closure_iff_nhds_basis EMetric.nhds_basis_closed_eball).2 fun ε hε ↦ ?_
```
It feels weird to mix term mode and tactic mode when most of the proof is tactic mode. If you really want to golf, you can put the `f` in the `refine` line, but I don't really see the point.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(ContinuousMapDense): reformulate using `Dense`
